list_definition.definition: to be in control or charge of

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: My lawyer manages all my legal affairs/money.
James manages the local football team.

list_definition.definition: to be able to do something; to succeed or cope

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Will you manage to repair your bicycle?
Can you manage (to eat) some more meat?
